title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Graviton: The best price performance for your AWS workloads (CMP360)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Graviton：为您的 AWS 工作负载提供最佳性价比 (CMP360)
abstract: AWS Graviton-based Amazon EC2 instances provide the best price performance for workloads in Amazon EC2. In this session, dive deep into the AWS Graviton processor and learn about its workload performance, energy efficiency, and software offerings. Graviton5 processor, our newest Graviton processors. Learn about common use cases, best practices to optimize your workloads across various applications, customer success stories, and how you can accelerate your AWS Graviton journey.
abstract_cn: 基于 AWS Graviton 的 Amazon EC2 实例为 Amazon EC2 中的工作负载提供最佳性价比。在本次会议中，深入了解 AWS Graviton 处理器，学习其工作负载性能、能源效率和软件产品。Graviton5 处理器是我们最新的 Graviton 处理器。了解常见用例、优化各种应用程序工作负载的最佳实践、客户成功案例，以及如何加速您的 AWS Graviton 之旅。
